title: Model Wedding
description: Model Wedding is the ultimate beauty dress-up game where you get to style four gorgeous brides on one of the biggest days of their lives. Some characters include supermodels and celebrities -- so the pressure is on to make over these high-profile brides. Mix and match stunning dresses, dazzling shoes, elegant veils, stylish handbags, beautiful bouquets, and sparkling jewelry. Show off your fashionista flair as you create the perfect bridal looks. With endless combinations to explore, unleash your inner designer and have a blast making each bride shine!
